meaningMnemonic: Inside your <radical>eye</radical> <radical>stand</radical>s a tiny <radical>village</radical> that makes up your <kanji>pupil</kanji>. That's the black part of your eye!
readingMnemonic: All of the people in your <kanji>pupil</kanji> eat <reading>dou</reading>ghnuts (どう) all day long. That's why your eye is shaped like a doughnut, with the "hole" (village) as their home.
